input_text.Prompt:
Generate an exciting product description that includes the product title and features in one paragraph of 6-8 sentences.

Product title:
SPRINGROSE 90 x 132 Inch Commercial Grade Heavy Duty Black Polyester Rectangle Tablecloths (Pack of 10)

Product features:
-Polyester
-Dimensions: 90” x 132” rectangle
-Pack of 10
-Color: Black
-Machine washable
-Great For weddings, banquets, anniversary parties, receptions, etc.
input_text.Response A: Ooh, ooh! Do you need a special tablecloth for your party? Look no further! Our SPRINGROSE 90 x 132 Inch Commercial Grade Heavy Duty Black Polyester Rectangle Tablecloths are perfect for weddings, banquets, anniversary parties, receptions, and more! They're made of super-strong polyester that can withstand lots of uses. Each pack has 10 tablecloths, so you'll have plenty for all your guests. And the best part? They're easy to wash in a machine! So, get ready to party with our awesome tablecloths! 🎉🎉🎉

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
